name: STITCHbyMonoprice
0:
”Alexa, turn on the plug”
”Alexa, turn off the plug”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
STITCH by Monoprice skill allows Amazon Alexa to be linked with STITCH products from Monoprice. 

You can enjoy a hands-free, smart home experience through voice command to control your smart devices. 

Visit www.monoprice.com to learn more about creating a smarter and safer home.

Check out additional devices to expand your smart home from our website.

STITCH by Monoprice
Connecting All Devices
